plot: The world has been destroyed. Fraternal twins Mitch and Petey have survived sometimes along with their girlfriends Sandra and Amy and their best friend Chet, and have to figure out how they fit into the new world.
plot_en: The world has been destroyed. Fraternal twins Mitch and Petey have survived sometimes along with their girlfriends Sandra and Amy and their best friend Chet, and have to figure out how they fit into the new world.
plot_es: The world has been destroyed. Fraternal twins Mitch and Petey have survived sometimes along with their girlfriends Sandra and Amy and their best friend Chet, and have to figure out how they fit into the new world.
title: Apocalypse Twins
